page.title: 1675 years Guiding Tebay
page.content: As part of the anniversary celebrations,Tebay Brownies held a shoe cleaning day from 14.00 to 17.00 We had to clean 75 pairs of shoes in 3 hours. At the end we counted all the shoes up & we had 81 pairs.We did this at the 'CROSS KEYS' and the 'JUNCTION HOTEL' car parks. On 27th June the Guides and Brownies went to Levens Hall,near Kendal for celebrations for the South Cumbria Area.There were nearly{1000}girls there from about 17.00. We saw the Friendship Flame lit and passed around the arena in an open topped double decker bus. Later we plan to have a barbeque. {Michelle Cowan,Margaret Thompson & {Amanda Satterthwaite. { }
